resp = client.ingest.put_pipeline(
    id="attachment",
    description="Extract attachment information",
    processors=[
        {
            "attachment": {
                "field": "data",
                "indexed_chars": 11,
                "indexed_chars_field": "max_size",
                "remove_binary": False
            }
        }
    ],
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.index(
    index="my-index-000001",
